sentences.en: As a major health risk hepatitis is second only to tobacco.
sentences.cn: 肝炎是仅次于吸烟的主要健康隐患。

sentences.en: He reached for a tin of tobacco on the shelf behind him.
sentences.cn: 他伸手去够身后架子上的一罐烟叶。

sentences.en: I certainly think there should be a ban on tobacco advertising.
sentences.cn: 我确实认为应该禁止香烟广告.

sentences.en: Johnson still knew next to nothing about tobacco.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊仍然对烟草几乎一无所知。

sentences.en: Philpott tamped a wad of tobacco into his pipe.
sentences.cn: 菲尔波特往烟斗里塞了一卷碎烟叶。

sentences.en: The air of the room was fetid with stale tobacco smoke.
sentences.cn: 房间里的空气有陈烟的臭味.

sentences.en: The long-anticipated study drew criticism from the tobacco industry.
sentences.cn: 让人期待已久的研究遭到了烟草行业的批评。

sentences.en: The room held the faint, sweet odour of pipe tobacco.
sentences.cn: 房间内有烟斗烟丝的淡淡馨香。

sentences.en: The tobacco industry escaped unscathed from its toughest legal challenge.
sentences.cn: 烟草业成功逃过了最严峻的法律质疑。

sentences.en: The tobacco industry has been trying to improve its image.
sentences.cn: 烟草行业一直在试图改善其形象。

sentences.en: The tobacco workers were paid on a piecework basis.
sentences.cn: 烟草工人拿的是计件报酬。

sentences.en: Try to do without tobacco and alcohol.
Try using lemon juice to remove tobacco stains from your fingers.
sentences.cn: 试试用柠檬汁去除手指上的烟渍。

words.tran_cn: [作物]烟草，烟叶；[轻]烟草制品；抽烟

phrases.tran_cn: 烤烟；热烟草；烟叶加工；熟烟

trans.tran_cn: 烟草，烟叶，烟草制品，卷烟，纸烟
trans.tran_en: the dried brown leaves that are smoked in cigarettes, pipes etc
